data.text: @SenJohnCurtis We call on Western governments to recognize and invite #RezaPahlavi. He represents a democratic future for Iran and a reliable partner for the West on stability, human rights, and regional security.
@BTwit54 @SenJohnCurtis I'll tell you one thing, he is a lousy dictator! Can you imagine Kim Jong Un putting up with this disrespect? What a joke.
@SenJohnCurtis At least you’re showing signs that you actually have a spine, John - unlike the majority in your party. But, really, are you really surprised by such racism?? https://t.co/KJazLZLzRC
@SenJohnCurtis It was hilarious and your a pussy
@NormieUtah @SenJohnCurtis Normie, I have to disagree on this one. I didn’t think it possible but John makes Mitt look manly.

@SenJohnCurtis I'd rather be called racist than be ruled by Jewish blackmailers, displaced by Indian H1B scammers, forced to subsidize millions of non English speaking Mexican school children, or be scammed by hostile African refugees.
@SenJohnCurtis the assumed moral superiority and arrogance of your posts for the party that slandered DJT over ten years is unintentionally ironic, if not laughable.
